name: Anti-Vaxx
description:
Anti-vaxxers put everyone at risk when they don't get vaccinations. Let's play a game to see why this helps diseases like measles spread.

  • Vaccinations help people's white blood cells fight off the disease so they can't get ill or spread it. 
  • For every area you infect the government will vaccinate another.

Don't get trapped!

This mini-game was installed as a demo at Research Without Borders (RWB, Bristol 2019).
